attributes.review: Just a loop of an hour long video of Trump eating an entire American flag. The audio, beyond vile. I would give five years of my life to unsee the American flag going all the way inside his body, but here I am, suffering the fallout. I will never know peace, I am BEGGING, take this off the platform, I pray others never see what I have, the chewing, the swallowing.... the horror.
attributes.title: WILL NEVER BE ABLE TO UNSEE!!!

attributes.review: We are supposed to be the “greatest country in the world” but something’s broken. Also this app is just trash at loading and basic functioning so if it could be removed along with Trumps authority... thank you!! There are other platforms that deserve to be saved.
attributes.title: Does not even work

attributes.review: i opened the app for the next rally and i see a cheeto running for office gross, when i saw the creepy lil 🍤 the man had i made me rip my eyes out with a spoon i now have the have alexa talk to text this, i fell down the stairs and broke 64 bones cause i ripped out my eyes, we really want a president with a literal cheeto size hooha but oh well i definitely will not be voting for mr. Oompa Loompa
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app almost destroyed my life. It asked me to sell my soul for some chicken nuggets. It had me in the first half, I sat there and thought to myself...”i am pretty hungry and chicken nights would be tasty, ” however I slowly figured out it was trying to trick me into becoming a racist republican. Like, why would anyone want that. 🤢🤮😰
attributes.title: This was my worst experience yet

attributes.review: This app was so bad when I woke up I saw my cat laying on the floor dead because I was using this app that’s what the vet told me and I said I can’t believe that happened how can I app do that and it was just amazing to me that it just happened so this app is disgusting to me and I hate it I hate it with all my Gut it’s so stupid and I hope God saves us all
attributes.title: No

If anyone is reading this send help i am being held hostage by a man with the skin the shade of a Cheeto. attributes.review: i can’t even BEGIN to describe my discomfort, displeasure, and dissatisfaction that i got out of this app. it’s revolting. the image/idea behind this app and its creation is an abomination. i cannot stress enough how much i didn’t enjoy downloading the app. for your own good and own health, do not download this app. do not even try. i beg of you.

attributes.review: The Cheeto man claims that China is stealing our data through TikTok but it’s just a ploy to distract from the fact that the this app is actually stealing your data. Don’t let him steal your data. If he knows your data he will come find you and steal your Cheetos to bathe in (it’s how he gets his orange complexion). Don’t let the Cheeto man steal your Cheetos! Do NOT get this app!
attributes.title: THIS APP WILL STEAL YOUR DATA
